entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Periods of light snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 24. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 35 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 25 by morning.
